name: Lost valley Adventure ✅
description:
Spoiler 🇺🇸

It is an adventure  game like effects and has story animations RPG Open World

Project theme

Jack is a boy who is not taken seriously, since he was little he always wanted to become a hero, to be taken seriously, but as such he was not at all listened to... 

The only person who supported him in all his decisions and ideas was his brother Adam, until he died for saving Jack in a collapse...

Then that's when everything changes! 

Monsters begin to appear and no one is safe from them, to protect his village Jack becomes the hero everyone needed.

It is a moral for people to never lose hope for what they want to be.

Partner with itch.io

Server Discord in Maintance

Spoiler 🇪🇸

Es un juego de aventura con efectos y contiene animaciones en la historia RPG en Mundo Abierto

Tema del proyecto

Jack es un chico que no es tomado enserio, desde pequeño siempre quiso convertirse en un héroe, que lo tomaran enserio, pero como tal no era para nada escuchado.. 

La única persona que lo apoyaba en todas sus decisiones y ideas era su hermano Adam, hasta que este por salvar a Jack en un derrumbe, muere..

Entonces es cuando todo cambia. 

Los monstruos comienzan a aparecer y nadie está a salvo de ellos, para proteger a su pueblo Jack se convierte en el héroe que todos necesitaban.

Es una moraleja para que la gente nunca pierda la esperanza de lo que quiere ser
